SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今[いま]なんじゃない?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Isn't it now?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: メラメラとたぎれ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Burn fiercely!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 眠[ねむ]っているだけの正義[せいぎ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Justice that is just sleeping.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: こんな僕[ぼく]も君[きみ]のヒーローになりたいのさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even I want to be your hero.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: かっこいい君[きみ]には
SongLyrics.EngStr: To someone cool like you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]じゃ頼[たよ]りないのかなんて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Am I too unreliable for you?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そりゃそうだよな
SongLyrics.EngStr: Yeah, that's probably true.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だって今[いま]もこうして迷[まよ]ってる
SongLyrics.EngStr: Because even now, I'm still lost.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 手[て]を取[と]ってくれないか
SongLyrics.EngStr: Won't you take my hand?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ギブとテイクさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's give and take.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]が僕[ぼく]のヒーローだった様[よう]に
SongLyrics.EngStr: Just like how you were my hero.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今[いま]なんじゃない?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Isn't it now?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: メラメラとたぎる
SongLyrics.EngStr: Burning fiercely.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: こんな僕[ぼく]にも潜[ひそ]む正義[せいぎ]が
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even within someone like me, there is hidden justice.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: どうしようもない衝動[しょうどう]に駆[か]られて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Driven by an uncontrollable impulse.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ほら気付[きづ]けば手[て]を握[にぎ]っている
SongLyrics.EngStr: Look, before I know it, I'm holding your hand.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いったいぜんたい
SongLyrics.EngStr: What on earth?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そんなに荷物[にもつ]を背負[しょい]込[こ]んでどこへ行[い]くの
SongLyrics.EngStr: Where are you going, carrying all that baggage?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ねえねえ待[ま]って僕[ぼく]にちょっと預[あず]けてみては?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Hey, wait. Why not let me carry some of it?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 信[しん]じてばかりの僕[ぼく]と
SongLyrics.EngStr: I only know how to trust.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 信[しん]じることが怖[こわ]い君[きみ]と
SongLyrics.EngStr: And you, who are afraid to trust.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: どちらが正[ただ]しいのかなんて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Which one is right?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 誰[だれ]にも分[わ]からないさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Nobody knows.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]らだけの世界[せかい]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Our world alone.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ギブとテイクさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's give and take.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 補[おぎな]い合[あ]えた暁[あかつき]には同[おな]じ夢[ゆめ]を見[み]たい
SongLyrics.EngStr: When we've made up for each other's weaknesses, I want to dream the same dream.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]はかっこいいと苦[くる]しめて
SongLyrics.EngStr: I made you suffer by calling you cool.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ひとりぼっちにさせたのは
SongLyrics.EngStr: Leaving you all alone.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 少[すこ]し僕[ぼく]のせいなんだよなごめんね
SongLyrics.EngStr: It's a little bit my fault, sorry.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だけど見[み]るべきはリアルだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: But we need to face reality.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今[いま]こそ僕[ぼく]が救[たす]けるんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Now is the time for me to save you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 抱[かか]えないで信[しん]じて頼[たよ]ってほしいんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Don't carry everything, trust me and rely on me.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 今[いま]なんじゃない?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Isn't it now?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: メラメラとたぎる
SongLyrics.EngStr: Burning fiercely.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: こんな僕[ぼく]にも潜[ひそ]む正義[せいぎ]が
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even within someone like me, there is hidden justice.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: どうしようもない衝動[しょうどう]に駆[か]られて
SongLyrics.EngStr: Driven by an uncontrollable impulse.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ほら気付[きづ]けば手[て]を握[にぎ]っている
SongLyrics.EngStr: Look, before I know it, I'm holding your hand.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ほっておけない
SongLyrics.EngStr: I can't leave you alone.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そんなに荷物[にもつ]を背負[しょい]込[こ]んでどこへ行[い]くの
SongLyrics.EngStr: Where are you going, carrying all that baggage?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ほんのちょっと僕[ぼく]にちょっと預[あず]けてみては?
SongLyrics.EngStr: Just a little, why not let me carry some of it?

SongLyrics.JpnStr: こんな僕[ぼく]も君[きみ]のヒーローになりたいのさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even I want to be your hero.
